Name: Terraria
Overview:
This Docker will download and install Terraria and run it. SERVER PASSWORD: Docker

ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files and creates the map!

Update Notice: The Container will check on every start/restart if there is a newer version of the game available and install it if so.

WEB CONSOLE: You can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9012 (eg: 192.168.1.1:9012) or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid.

TCP - WebConsole.Name: TCP - WebConsole
TCP - WebConsole.Description: WebConsole (by default, you can connect to the Terraria console by opening your browser and go to HOSTIP:9012 - eg: 192.168.1.1:9012 - or click on WebUI on the Docker page within Unraid).

Preferred Terraria version.Name: Preferred Terraria version
Preferred Terraria version.Description: Enter your prefered Terraria version (you can get the latest version number for example here: https://terraria.fandom.com/wiki/Server#Downloads)

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.
